verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G4779>called<s%> his <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4779>together,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1140>devils,<s%> and to <S%G2323>cure<s%> <S%G3554>diseases.<s%>
And he <S%G649>sent<s%> them to <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and to <S%G2390>heal<s%> the <S%G770>sick.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> for <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3598>journey,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G4464>staves,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4082>money,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G694>money;<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats<s%> apiece. <S%G303><s%>
And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> you <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3306>abide,<s%> and <S%G1564>there<s%> depart. <S%G1831><s%>

And whoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> will not <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, when you <S%G1831>go<s%> out of that <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G660>shake<s%> <S%G660>off<s%> the <S%G2532>very<s%> <S%G2868>dust<s%> from <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them.

And they <S%G1831>departed,<s%> and <S%G1330>went<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> the <S%G2968>towns,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3837>every<s%> <S%G3837>where.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G1096>done<s%> by him: and he was <S%G1280>perplexed,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> that it was <S%G3004>said<s%> of <S%G5100>some,<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>

And of <S%G5100>some,<s%> that <S%G2243>Elias<s%> had <S%G5316>appeared;<s%> and of <S%G243>others,<s%> that <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> was <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>

And <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> have I <S%G607>beheaded:<s%> but <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> things? And he <S%G2212>desired<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> him.

And the <S%G652>apostles,<s%> when they were <S%G5290>returned,<s%> <S%G1334>told<s%> him <S%G3745>all<s%> that they had <S%G4160>done.<s%> And he <S%G3880>took<s%> them, and <S%G5298>went<s%> <S%G5298>aside<s%> <S%G2596>privately<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> belonging to the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G966>Bethsaida.<s%>

And the <S%G3793>people,<s%> when they <S%G1097>knew<s%> it, <S%G190>followed<s%> him: and he <S%G1209>received<s%> them, and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2390>healed<s%> them that <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G2322>healing.<s%>

And when the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2827>wear<s%> away, <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G630>Send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> that they may <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>towns<s%> and <S%G68>country<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2945>about,<s%> and <S%G2647>lodge,<s%> and <S%G2147>get<s%> <S%G1979>victuals:<s%> for we are <S%G5602>here<s%> in a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

But he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1325>Give<s%> you them to eat. <S%G5315><s%> And they <S%G2036>said,<s%> We <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> but <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes;<s%> <S%G1509>except<s%> we should <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

For they were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2625>Make<s%> them <S%G2625>sit<s%> <S%G2625>down<s%> by <S%G4004>fifties<s%> in a company. <S%G2828><s%>
And they <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3779>so,<s%> and <S%G347>made<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> and <S%G308>looking<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them, and <S%G2622>broke,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And they did <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5526>filled:<s%> and there was <S%G142>taken<s%> up of <S%G2801>fragments<s%> that <S%G4052>remained<s%> to them <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as he was <S%G2651>alone<s%> <S%G4336>praying,<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were with him: and he <S%G1905>asked<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Whom<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> that I am? <S%G1511><s%>

They <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> but <S%G243>some<s%> <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2243>Elias;<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> say, that <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> is <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, But <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And he straightly <S%G2008>charged<s%> them, and <S%G3853>commanded<s%> them to <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> that thing;

<S%G2036>Saying,<s%> The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things, and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>slain,<s%> and be <S%G1453>raised<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> me, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross<s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G622>lose<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for my <S%G1752>sake,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> it.

For <S%G5101>what<s%> is a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5623>advantaged,<s%> if he <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> be <S%G2210>cast<s%> away? <S%G2210><s%>

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall be <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of me and of my <S%G3056>words,<s%> of him shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1870>ashamed,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in his own <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and in his <S%G3962>Father's,<s%> and of the <S%G40>holy<s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>

But I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you of a <S%G230>truth,<s%> there be <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall not <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> they <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass <S%G5616>about<s%> an <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> and <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray.<s%>

And as he <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> the <S%G1491>fashion<s%> of his <S%G4383>countenance<s%> was <S%G1096>altered,<s%> <S%G2097><s%> and his <S%G2441>raiment<s%> was <S%G3022>white<s%> and <S%G1823>glistering.<s%>
And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G4814>talked<s%> with him <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> were <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and <S%G2243>Elias:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> in <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G3004>spoke<s%> of his <S%G1841>decease<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G4137>accomplish<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and they that were with him were <S%G916>heavy<s%> with <S%G5258>sleep:<s%> and when they were <S%G1235>awake,<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> that <S%G4921>stood<s%> with him.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as they <S%G1316>departed<s%> from him, <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1988>Master,<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for us to be <S%G5602>here:<s%> and let us <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacles;<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> for you, and <S%G3391>one<s%> for <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> and <S%G3391>one<s%> for <S%G2243>Elias:<s%> not <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G3004>said.<s%>

While he <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and <S%G1982>overshadowed<s%> them: and they <S%G5399>feared<s%> as they <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud.<s%>
And there <S%G1096>came<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> out of the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son:<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> him.

And <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> was <S%G1096>past,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%> And they <S%G4601>kept<s%> it <S%G4601>close,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> of those things <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G3708>seen.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1836>next<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> when they were <S%G2718>come<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> from the <S%G3735>hill,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> him.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of the <S%G3793>company<s%> <S%G310>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> I <S%G1189>beseech<s%> you, <S%G1914>look<s%> on my <S%G5207>son:<s%> for he is <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>child.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>see,<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2983>takes<s%> him, and he <S%G1810>suddenly<s%> <S%G2896>cries<s%> out; and it <S%G4682>tears<s%> him that he <S%G876>foams<s%> <S%G3326>again,<s%> and <S%G4937>bruising<s%> him <S%G3425>hardly<s%> <S%G672>departs<s%> from him.
And I <S%G1189>sought<s%> your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> him out; and they <S%G1410>could<s%> not.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> O <S%G571>faithless<s%> and <S%G1294>perverse<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G2193>how<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> shall I be with you, and <S%G430>suffer<s%> you? <S%G4317>Bring<s%> your <S%G5207>son<s%> here. <S%G5602><s%>

And as he was <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G4334>coming,<s%> the <S%G1140>devil<s%> <S%G4952>threw<s%> him down, and <S%G4952>tare<s%> him. And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G2390>healed<s%> the <S%G3816>child,<s%> and <S%G591>delivered<s%> him <S%G591>again<s%> to his <S%G3962>father.<s%>

And they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1605>amazed<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G3168>mighty<s%> <S%G3168>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> But while they <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

Let <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> <S%G5087>sink<s%> down <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3775>ears:<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

But they <S%G50>understood<s%> not <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying,<s%> and it was <S%G3871>hid<s%> from them, that they <S%G143>perceived<s%> it not: and they <S%G5399>feared<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> him of that <S%G4487>saying.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> there <S%G1525>arose<s%> a <S%G1261>reasoning<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them, <S%G5101>which<s%> of them should be <S%G3187>greatest.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1492>perceiving<s%> the <S%G1261>thought<s%> of their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> a <S%G3813>child,<s%> and <S%G2476>set<s%> him by him,

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> in my <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> me: and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G1209>receive<s%> me <S%G1209>receives<s%> him that <S%G649>sent<s%> me: for he that is <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G3956>all,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall be great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1988>Master,<s%> we <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1544>casting<s%> out <S%G1140>devils<s%> in your <S%G3686>name;<s%> and we <S%G2967>forbade<s%> him, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G190>follows<s%> not with us.
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Forbid <S%G2967><s%> him not: for he that is not <S%G2596>against<s%> us is for us.
